name: Tresor Break
description:
you've just robbed a bank and are now escaping with your trusty jetpack and the safe you stole.
get through the city safely and gather diamonds.
GOOD LUCK!

controls:

use arrow keys or WASD to pilot the jetpack.
but pay attention, your jetpack is not build for so much weight so everything happens a bit slower!

pickup diamonds with the tresor. if you manage to pick every diamond up in the right order, the multiplier increases.

rockets are introduced by the warning signals on the right.

this game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
